overview:
Bruce Crowley is the Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Hilbert Technology. Hilbert Technology has created a software system for very high-speed data processing for complex data analysis and for enhancing the performance of mobile software applications.

He served as Vice Chairman of ACTV Inc from 1994 through 2003 and led the development of ACTV’s enhanced media and online education businesses.
